    OUTPUT - The type of object that is output from the transformer

    Transformer<CSVRecordInfo,OUTPUT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrahmsMultiMediaTransformer, BrahmsSpecimenTransformer, CoLReferenceTransformer, CoLSynonymTransformer, CoLTaxonTransformer, CoLVernacularNameTransformer

    public abstract class AbstractCSVTransformer<OUTPUT>
extends AbstractTransformer<CSVRecordInfo,OUTPUT>
    Base class for Transformers that take a CSV record as input.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman
